title: Covid-19: ensuring equality of access to testing for ethnic minorities.
text: Covid-19: ensuring equality of access to testing for ethnic minorities.

similar.title: Why are ethnic minorities worse affected?
text: Why are ethnic minorities worse affected?
Inequalities mean a disproportionate number of covid-19 patients are from minority ethnic backgrounds, reports Layal Liverpool.
abstract: Inequalities mean a disproportionate number of covid-19 patients are from minority ethnic backgrounds, reports Layal Liverpool.
